QuestData.Title: Remembrance of Auberdine
QuestData.RewardText: I just want to offer my sincerest thanks for all that you've done for us. In my grief, I'm afraid that I didn't extend the gratitude that you truly deserve. We may not have made it here without you.$B$BKnow that you will always have friends here.$B$BAnd you needn't worry about my loneliness. Grimclaw has taken to keeping me company, and I have to say he's a more comforting companion than I would have expected.$B$BTake this, and go with all our blessings. Until we meet again, $n.
